name: Gunheart
detailed_description:
Gunheart is a co-op shooter built from the ground up for virtual reality. You and your friends will inhabit robotic bounty hunters trying to make a buck at the edge of the galaxy; there you will blast aliens, explore exotic locations and rake in cash to upgrade your rig. Along the way you’ll master a large arsenal of weapons and discover mods that can change them in unique ways.

Battle your way through hours of bug-infested frontier where the environments and encounters are remixed to make the missions feel different every time you play. If other players drop in to join you mid-mission, the game will dynamically adjust the difficulty so you'll be challenged playing solo or with a crew.

At the mission hub you’ll be able to outfit your rig with an array of high-tech murder machines that will have you blasting, hacking and mowing enemies down with full motion control. If you prefer to get up close and personal when dismembering your foes, you can use your multitool to grab barrels, crates and even enemies to use as makeshift weapons.

Completing missions also offers the chance to earn loot which can be smashed open back at the Bent Horizon. Smashing open loot will unlock either cosmetic items to customize your look, weapon modifications to reconfigure your weapons in dramatic ways, or bonus cash to further help support your bounty hunting efforts. Each weapon can have up to 3 modifications stacked, allowing you to uniquely customize your favorite weapons to fit your playstyle. There are currently 40+ weapon modifications and 50+ cosmetic items to discover.

To navigate the hostile environment that is Planet Fortune, you're outfitted with a full suite of locomotion options that allow you to teleport or strafe, play standing, seated, or to room scale. A full set of control scheme options allow users to easily switch between layouts, and comfort options such as dynamic "blinders" can be toggled based on player preference.

Gunheart supports full cross-play between Oculus Touch, HTC Vive, and Windows MR.

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR

short_description: Gunheart is a co-op shooter built from the ground up for virtual reality. You and your friends will inhabit robotic bounty hunters trying to make a buck at the edge of the galaxy; there you will blast aliens, explore exotic locations, unlock new gear, and rake in cash to boost your rig. Along the way you’ll master a large arsenal of weapons and discover 40+ mods to customize your loadout.
reviews:
“The game world is also pretty darn gorgeous, which helps endear Gunheart to me.”
9.5 – Bleeding Cool

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

package_groups.name: subscriptions
package_groups.title: Buy Gunheart Subscription Plan
package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.

subs.option_description: 29,99€ at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at 36,99€.
